hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that:The Prophet [SAW] said: "The makers of these images will be punished on the Day of Resurrection, and it will be said to them: 'Breathe life into that which you have created

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يُكَلَّفُ أَصْحَابُ الصُّوَرِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What the Image-Makers Will be Commanded to Do on the Day of Resurrection
